stripped_text: Whenever the Runner approaches a piece of ice protecting this server, you may trash this upgrade. If you do, gain 3 credits and you may swap the ice being approached with a piece of ice from Archives or HQ.
text: Whenever the Runner approaches a piece of ice protecting this server, you may trash this upgrade. If you do, gain 3[credit] and you may swap the ice being approached with a piece of ice from Archives or HQ.
title: Mitra Aman
